note: Illicit drugs are drugs that have been prohibited under international drug control treaties. They include opioids, cocaine, amphetamines and cannabis.
title: Deaths from illicit drugs
subtitle: Shown in blue is the estimated annual number of deaths attributed to [drug use](#dod:drug_use). Shown in red is the estimated annual number of deaths from [drug use disorders](#dod:drug_use_disorder). The difference between them is that they relate to indirect and direct causes of death, respectively.
